comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com) ### Comment > I had a reddit post, no helpful tips there: > https://www.reddit.com/r/Adguard/comments/16ax5u8/adguard_desktop_win_app_stopped_blocking_some_ad/ > Again - no user blocking works there, for some reason (trying to block Shorts shelf - NOTHING WORKS!) after reloading page - it is still there. weird thing is that AdGuard bubble icon is not on YouTube site...just the icon of the extension on top...usually I had a bubble in the bottom there. the Video ads an some cosmetic ads are hidden though ### Screenshots

issue.title: quizlet.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://quizlet.com/sign-up?signupOrigin=global-footer](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fquizlet.com%2Fsign-up%3FsignupOrigin%3Dglobal-footer) ### Comment > With AdGuard turned on, the Quizlet website no longer loads the sign in or sign up page, and appears as if the button was not clicked at all, even if navigating to the direct URL of the sign in page. Therefore, it is not possible to sign in to Quizlet with AdGuard turned on. With AdGuard turned off, the sign in page loads quickly as a overlay that obscures whatever page was behind it. The cookie prompt also comes back, but that is not essential for sign in to work. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/bcg90y43f7wo80sk0s4k0occow4g0s8j9dv5uw5wl4.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/few46g4f2m80880w44kkw044k04k8845kbdbo6jpyg.png?nc=1)

Block WebRTC,

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.24ur.com/novice/slovenija/od-zavarovalnice-za-poruseno-hiso-samo-11000-evrov.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.24ur.com%2Fnovice%2Fslovenija%2Fod-zavarovalnice-za-poruseno-hiso-samo-11000-evrov.html) ### Comment > When i try to play video on 24ur.com, the video player detects adblocker. > > example: https://www.24ur.com/novice/slovenija/od-zavarovalnice-za-poruseno-hiso-samo-11000-evrov.html > > Instead of real video, it plays 15 second video, telling me to disable adblocker. It's in slovenian language. ### Screenshots

issue.title: sbv2.yugsw.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://sbv2.yugsw.ru/html5client/join?sessionToken=vdm7wloeyafx0zlt](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsbv2.yugsw.ru%2Fhtml5client%2Fjoin%3FsessionToken%3Dvdm7wloeyafx0zlt) ### Comment > Используется платформа BigBlueButton, где присутствует возможность по ссылке из видео хостинга (в данном случае youtube) демонстрировать данный видеоролик. Со включенным расширением, видео не проигрывается, выдавая ошибку. При выключение расширения - всё работает. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/s9rbcqm6sys0kw4oo44goo8o80g4cg4tpu037z3av4.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pktgie7kzmswkkok0sksooso88wg002gbup0mig7ms.png?nc=1)
